titleStmt.title: A catholike and ecclesiasticall exposition of the holy Gospell after S. Iohn. Gathered out of all the singuler and approued deuines (which the Lorde hath giuen vnto his Church) by Augustine Marlorate. And translated out of Latin into Englishe by Thomas Timme minister. Seene and allovved according to the order appoynted
Novi Testamenti catholica expositio ecclesiastica. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Marlorat, Augustin, 1506-1562.
Tymme, Thomas, d. 1620.

notesStmt.note: A translation of selections from: Novi Testamenti catholica expositio ecclesiastica.
Running title reads: An ecclesiasticall exposition vpon Saint Iohn.
The 3 pages after 376 are numbered 376, 379, and 381.
At least one copy has slip-cancel "J. Harrison, 1575" pasted over the imprint (STC); other copies show signs of once having had a slip-cancel.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 554 and at reel 1387 (same copy filmed twice).
